SELECT EDA.EDCT_APLC_ID AS edctAplcId , CMB.BRNM AS brnm , CMU.USER_NM AS userNm , EDM.EDCT_NM AS edctNm , EDA.APLC_TS AS aplcTs , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_IEP_CMU001M WHERE USER_ID = EDA.DPM_ATHZ_ID) AS dpmAthzNm , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_IEP_CMU001M WHERE USER_ID = EDA.GRM_ATHZ_ID) AS grmAthzNm , EDA.APLC_STG_CD AS aplcStgCd FROM TB_IEP_EDA001M EDA, TB_IEP_EDC001M EDC, TB_IEP_EDM001M EDM, TB_IEP_CMU001M CMU, TB_IEP_CMB001M CMB WHERE EDA.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND EDA.DVCD = #{dvcd}
AND EDA.APLC_TS BETWEEN CONCAT(#{sttgYmd}, ' 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#{fnshYmd}, ' 23:59:59')
AND EDA.APLC_TS BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -3 MONTH ) AND NOW()
AND EDA.APLC_STG_CD = 'APRFIN'
AND (EDA.APLC_STG_CD = 'APRDPM' OR EDA.APLC_STG_CD = 'APRGRM')
AND (EDA.APLC_STG_CD = 'REJDPM' OR EDA.APLC_STG_CD = 'REJGRM')
AND EDA.APLC_STG_CD != CANCEL
AND EDA.EDCT_CNT_ID = EDC.EDCT_CNT_ID AND EDC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND EDC.EDCT_ID = EDM.EDCT_ID AND EDM.USE_YN = 'Y' AND EDA.USER_ID = CMU.USER_ID AND CMU.USE_YN = 'Y' AND CMU.DVCD = CMB.BRCD AND CMB.USE_YN ='Y' ORDER BY EDA.APLC_TS DESC

WITH EDA AS ( SELECT EDCT_APLC_ID, DVCD, USER_ID, APLC_TS , DPM_ATHZ_ID, DPM_ATHZ_TS, GRM_ATHZ_ID, GRM_ATHZ_TS , APLC_STG_CD, RTRE_CON FROM TB_IEP_EDA001M WHERE EDCT_APLC_ID = #{edctAplcId} ), CMUB AS ( SELECT CMU.USER_ID, CMU.USER_NM, CMB.BRCD, CMB.BRNM, CLA.ATHR_NM FROM TB_IEP_CMU001M CMU, TB_IEP_CMB001M CMB, TB_IEP_CLA001C CLA WHERE CMU.DVCD = CMB.BRCD AND CMU.USE_YN = 'Y' AND CMB.USE_YN = 'Y' AND CMU.ATHR_CD = CLA.ATHR_CD AND CLA.USE_YN = 'Y' ) SELECT EDA.EDCT_APLC_ID AS edctAplcId , CMUB.BRNM AS brnm , CMUB.USER_NM AS userNm , EDA.APLC_TS AS aplcTs , (SELECT BRNM FROM CMUB WHERE USER_ID = EDA.DPM_ATHZ_ID) AS dpmAThzDvcd , (SELECT USER_NM FROM CMUB WHERE USER_ID = EDA.DPM_ATHZ_ID) AS dpmUserNm , (SELECT ATHR_NM FROM CMUB WHERE USER_ID = EDA.DPM_ATHZ_ID) AS dpmAThzNm , EDA.DPM_ATHZ_TS AS dpmAthzTs , (SELECT BRNM FROM CMUB WHERE USER_ID = EDA.GRM_ATHZ_ID) AS grmAThzDvcd , (SELECT USER_NM FROM CMUB WHERE USER_ID = EDA.GRM_ATHZ_ID) AS grmUserNm , (SELECT ATHR_NM FROM CMUB WHERE USER_ID = EDA.GRM_ATHZ_ID) AS grmAThzNm , EDA.GRM_ATHZ_TS AS grmAthzTs , EDA.APLC_STG_CD AS aplcStgCd , EDA.RTRE_CON AS rtreCon FROM EDA, CMUB WHERE EDA.USER_ID = CMUB.USER_ID;
